links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Robert Farquharson''' ([[6 November|November 6]], [[1877]] - [[11 January|January 11]], [[1966]]) was an English stage and radio actor. In the [[1955]] radio series ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'', he played [[Saruman]] and [[Denethor]]. 

He is the oldest at age actor who played in any adaptation of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien's]] works.
